name: Emblem of Severed Fate
description:
After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.
The DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: </color>The character to which this is attached gains 1 $[K310].\nThe DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: </color>The character to which this is attached gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>.\nThe DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2.
